channel.title: Client closes after a few seconds, please help!
channel.description:
I've tried multiple clients(317,508,etc.).
I LOG INTO ANY SERVER, AND I CLICK A CERTAIN OBJECT AND THE CLIENT CLOSES. SUCH AS ON THIS 508, I OPEN A SHOP, CLICK OFF TO WALK AND IT JUST CLOSES.
[b]WINDOWS VISTA - 64 BIT OPERATING SYSTEM
[/b]
ERROR:
[code]# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8e7786, pid=1904, tid=4888 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b06 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b16 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #

item.title: Client closes after a few seconds, please help!
item.dc:creator: @bigbaddrag bigbaddrag
item.description:
@bigbaddrag wrote:

you need to replace the word java with the location, so it should look like this

@echo off title RuneNet Alpha "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar client pause

BE SURE TO LEAVE “” IN IT K?

Read full topic
item.source: Client closes after a few seconds, please help!

item.title: Client closes after a few seconds, please help!
item.dc:creator: @GoldenScape GoldenScape
item.description:
@GoldenScape wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:5, topic:351405”][quote author=GoldenScape link=topic=447762.msg3288374#msg3288374 date=1280365398]
SERIOUSLY. THERES LIKE 300,000 PEOPLE ON THIS FORUM? AND NOT 1 PERSON CAN MAKE A POST AND HELP ME?

Right Click And Edit The Run File Add “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java”

That didn’t work^^ :/.
[/quote]

Post the code in the batch file that you use to run your client.[/quote]

@echo off title RuneNet Alpha java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar client C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java pause

or:

start C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java java -Xmx500m -cp exit

Read full topic
item.source: Client closes after a few seconds, please help!

Right Click And Edit The Run File Add “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java”

That didn’t work^^ :/.[/quote]
